rdf:Description.rdfs:label: GlobalHorizontalSolar
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The intensity of global solar radiation in horizontal level

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Unit_of_measure
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The unit of the observation value or KPI calculation value

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: attendee
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Event and the Occupants who attend it

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Equipment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The equipment in building and district power system.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EquipmentParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The parameters of power equipment or building equipment.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Duct
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The duct in HVAC system

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasMathematicalModel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a KPI and its mathematical model

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: StrategicKPI
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The strategic KPI is the KPI at the strategic decision level, the hyper-aggregated KPI corresponding to district scale

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasBehavior
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Occupant with its behavior (action to building energy systems)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EquipmentContainer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Equipment container is the district power unit that contains groups of equipment, like substation, plant, Distributed Energy Resources, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasEvaluationTimeStep
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The evaluation time step of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: GeographicalCoordinatesPoint
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Uniquely identified by lat/long/alt. i.e.
spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2) :- lat(P1, LAT), long(P1, LONG), alt(P1, ALT), lat(P2, LAT), long(P2, LONG), alt(P2, ALT).
sameThing(P1, P2) :- type(P1, Point), type(P2, Point), spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2).
A point, typically described using a coordinate system relative to Earth, such as WGS84, includes the latitude, altitude and longitude of a place.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Non-renewableGeneratingUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The generating unit produces energy with non-renewable resources.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ExteriorWindow
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The exterior window that contributes thermal load to the building and zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PowerDeliveryUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Power devices that are capable of delivering electric power to the household

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyProducerFacility
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy facility in the building that produces energy

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasPhotovoltaicType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a PV generating unit to its photovoltaic type

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Location
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A spatial region or named place. It contains the geographical coordinates point or postal address of an object.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: containsU-value
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a building envelope (exterior wall, exterior window, roof or floor) and its U-value

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: TacticalKPI
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The tactical KPI is the KPI at tactical decision level, the KPI disaggregated from strategic KPI corresponding to building and system level

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: containsConstant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The constant in the mathematical model for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: TemporalEntity
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity is an instant or an interval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasInput
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The input of datum source for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Interval
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time interval of the observation or evaluation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergySupplyFromEnergyProvider
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy supplied by district energy provider for end uses

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WeatherForecast
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The short-term forecast of the weather

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EntityType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Entity type describes the type of a entity like building, equipment, energy, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergySupplyFromStorage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy supplied by storage system for end uses

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pump
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The pump in HVAC system, DHW system, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyGain
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy gain is the produced energy that feed into external grid so as to obtain monetary gain

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DHWSystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The domestic hot water system that provides hot water to the building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasBuildingType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a Building and its functional type

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Assumption
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The assumption of the methematical model of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Wind
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The wind condition like wind speed and wind direction

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Equation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The equation of the mathematical model for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasProperty
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The chain here ensures that the observed property of an observation is a property of the feature of interest.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contains
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation describing one object is included in another object.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EM-KPI Ontology, Energy Management - Key Performance Indicator Ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The targeted EM-KPI Ontology are aimed to exchange both master data and key performance information in district and building energy management for a multi-level energy performance analysis that addresses stakeholders’ performance goals. The targeted EM-KPI ontology is proposed to be represented by two subparts, i.e. EM (Energy Management) master data part and KPI (Key Performance Indicator) part. The purpose of KPI part is to represent the key performance information. It is supposed to describe the definition of each KPI and their relationship, KPI calculation and needed datum source, the related performance goal and evaluated object. This subpart should provide the basis for energy performance tracking and assessment. The purpose of the EM master data part is to integrate the master data. It is supposed to describe the master data domains, master data objects and master data elements, and the relationship between each other. This subpart is used to exploit the knowledge in master data sources for identification of energy performance problems and key areas for improvement, so as to make informed decision in energy performance improvement. The master data domains in district and building energy management include energy domain (e.g. energy generation, energy distribution, energy consumption), sensor and measurement domain, building domain, facility domain, occupancy, weather, location, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isSpeedOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Inverse property of wo:hasSpeed

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WindGeneratingUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The generating unit produces energy with wind energy, wind turbines.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suppliesTo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking Energy Supply to the Energy Demand

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: containsEquation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The equation of the mathematical model of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasKPIDefinition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The definition of Key Performance Indicator

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasLocation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an object or event to a geographical Location.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyCostTariff
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The tariff for purchasing energy per unit from main grid (district energy provider)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyConsumerFacility
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy facility in the building that consumes energy.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A functional data property with unique values to make individuals different when their values are different.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnvironmentalParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The parameter describes the environment condition, including indoor environment (indoor comfort) and outdoor environment (weather)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Shade
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The shade of building envelope

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasBeginning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Interval to its beginning Instant

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OperationalKPI
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The operational KPI is the KPI at the operational appliance level, the KPI corresponding to zone and equipment level.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Humidity
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Outdoor humidity

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: FeatureOfInterest
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A feature is an abstraction of real world phenomena (thing, person, event, etc)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To describe the unit of observation value and KPI value

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: producesEnergyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy generation system or equipment to the Energy Type ir produces

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingThing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: All things (here physical objects) that creates a building, it is intended as root of all building components.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyFacility
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy facility in building that consumes or produces energy

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Mathematical_model
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mathematical model for KPI calculation. The model is composed of a set of variables and a set of equations that establish relationships between the variables.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Battery
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The set of batteries that stores energy.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: containsAssumption
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The assumption of the mathematical model for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyConsumer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Energy consumer is the power unit that consumes energy in district microgrid.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: KPICalculationComponent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The component needed for KPI calculation, like mathematical model, datum source, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasOutput
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The output of KPI calculation, the calculation result of KPI

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasAssociatedZone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the Indoor Comfort and its associated Zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: producesEnergy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy generating system or equipment with the Energy Production parameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: KeyPerformanceIndicator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Key Performance Indicator that measures the progress towards stakeholder's key performance goal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasCalculationComponent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the KPI Calculation and its needed Calculation Components

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HVACSystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) system that provides building indoor comfort

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasMathML
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The MathML of the equation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: event
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its Event

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyForecast
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The forecast of energy demand or production

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasYearOfConstruction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking Building and its constructed year.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Variable
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The variable in the mathematical model of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasOccupant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its Occupant.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isMathematicalModelOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a KPI with its mathematical model

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DistributedEnergyResources
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Distributed energy resource is the site energy resource in district like CHP (Combined Heat and Power), photovoltaic generation plant, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Volume
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the volume of the air conditioned space in building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storesEnergyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy storage system or equipment to Energy Type it stores

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pipe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The pipe in HVAC system, DHW system, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experiences
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the District and the Weather it experiences.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WeatherPhenomenon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Weather phenomenon describes the ourdoor temperature, humidity, solar radiation and wind.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasAssociatedKPI
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The performance goal of stakeholder has associated key performance indicators to measure the progress towards the goal.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingStorey
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Building storey captures the storey structure in building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DatumSource
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum source needed for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasForecast
Relation linking Weather or Energy to its forecast
hasDirection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a Wind and its direction

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OccupancyParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The parameter of occupancy like occupant number or other property

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasExteriorWall
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its exterior wall

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Event
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The event taken place in the zone, such entertainment event, dinner, conference, etc. A non-persistent, time-based occurrence, has location, duration, and responsible actors associated with an event.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Floor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The floor of the zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasDisaggregation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Strategic KPI can be disaggregated to tactical KPI, and tactical KPI can be disaggregated to operational KPI.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: GlobalInclined41Solar
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The intensity of global solar radiation in angel of 41 degree, the best angel in Madrid

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: KPIEvaluatedObject
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The evaluated object of key performance indicator

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ThermalComfort
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Thermal comfort describes the comfort condition related indoor temperature and humidity

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storesEnergy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy storage system or equipemnt to the Energy Storage parameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inXSDDateTime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Instant and a dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duration
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Event and its duration

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Appliance
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The household appliance that consumes energy, such as fridge, oven, TV, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: RenewableGeneratingUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The generating unit produces energy with renewable resources.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergySupplyFromSiteProduction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy supplied directly by site production for end uses

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Room
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The room contained in the zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Building type describes the functinonal type of a building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VisualComfort
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The visual comfort describes the comfort related to light condition

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasRoof
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its Roof

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: observationSamplingTime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time interval of an observation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: KPIValue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: KPI value is the result of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WeatherCondition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weather condition describes the weather such as rain, sun, snow, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OccupantBehavior
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The behavior of occupant that influences to energy demand

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ObservationValue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The observation result of the sensor or meter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingEquipment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The equipment contained in building
The building in the district.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Building
composes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the Power Equipment and Equipment Container.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasEquipmentType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Equipment and its type

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyProduction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Energy producted by generation system

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Substation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Substation is where transform the high/medio voltage power from main grid to low voltage for the energy use of district consumers.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasPerformanceGoal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The performance goals of stakeholders.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: UniversalConstant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The universal constant in the mathematical model of KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isCalculationComponentOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the KPI needed Calculation Components and its Calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: LightingSystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The lighting system in the building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: address
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To describe the address of a Location

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: GeneratingUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Generating unit is the power unit that generates energy for district end users, like photovoltaic array.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a Location to geographical coordinates point.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Weather
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Weather describes the outdoor environment

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasArea
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking Building and its constructed Area.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasAirConditionedVolume
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a Building and its air conditioned Volume.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isDirectionOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Inverse property of wo:hasDirection

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: IndoorAirQuality
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indoor air quality describes the quality (or contamination level) of indoor air

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Schedule
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The day schedule of the event taken place in the zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The building static parameter that to be measured, like area, volume, material property

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PVSystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: System that generates electricity through solar photovoltaic panel

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Zone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The thermal zone in the building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: observedProperty
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Observation to the Property that was observed. The observedProperty should be a Property (hasProperty) of the FeatureOfInterest (linked by featureOfInterest) of this observation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Stakeholder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The stakeholder in district or building that has performance goals to be achieved

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deliversEnergyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the power delivery system or equipment to the Energy Type it delivers

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: featureOfInterest
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Observation to its Feature Of Interest.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: title
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To describe the name of an object
District is the platform where contains multi buildings and other physical objects.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: District
Fan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The fan in HVAC system

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deliversEnergy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the power delivery system or equipment to the Energy Supply parameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasEnd
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Interval to its end Instant

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Roof
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The roof of the zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasValue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation to describe an value of an observation or KPI

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isPropertyOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation between a FeatureOfInterest and a Property (a Quality observable by a sensor) of that feature.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isProvidedBy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The datum source for KPI calculation is provided by observation. The energy storage is provided by energy production. The energy supply is provided by energy production or energy storage.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: consumesEnergy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy consumption system or equipment to the Energy Demand parameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Area
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the area of the building.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Energy parameter describes energy behavior in district and buildings, inluding energy production, energy storage, energy supply, energy demand, energy cost and tariff, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PhotovoltaicGeneratingUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The generating unit produces energy with solar energy, photovoltaic panels.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WindPowerSystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: System that generates electricity through wind power

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OccupantNumber
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The number of occupants in the zone or building

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasCalculationModel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To represent the mathematical model for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasFloor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its Floor

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyTariff
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tariff that is charged per energy unit by district energy providers

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ExteriorWall
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The exterior wall that contributes thermal load to the building and zone

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: containsVariable
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The variable of the mathematical model for KPI calculation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Instant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instant is a time instant
The KPI calculation to calculate specific KPI with mathematical model and datum source
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: KPICalculation
EnergyCost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The cost for purchasing energy from external grid

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: U-value
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Overall thermal conductance of the envelope

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PowerSystemResource
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Power system resource is the resource in district microgrid, including energy generation units, energy storage units, energy consumers and power delivery system, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergySupply
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy supplied to end uses

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasCalculation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To represent the calculation of key performance indicators

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasAssociatedObject
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To relate Key Performance Indicators with their evaluated objects.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasEquipmentParameter
Relation linking Equipment and its Equipment Parameter
hasExteriorWindow
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking building Zone and its exterior window

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy type produced, consumed, stored or provided, such as electricity, heat and cold

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SolarIrradiance
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The intensity of outdoor solar radiation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Observation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The observation data of the sensor or meter, the measurement of different parameter An Observation is a Situation in which a Sensing method has been used to estimate or calculate a value of a Property of a FeatureOfInterest. Links to Sensing and Sensor describe what made the Observation and how; links to Property and Feature detail what was sensed; the result is the output of a Sensor; other metadata details times etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EquipmentType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Equipment type describes the type of an equipment

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: StoringUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Storing unit is the device that stores energy.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasSchedule
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking an Event and its Schedule

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ObservationProperty
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The observed property describes what kind of data is observed.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: consumesEnergyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the energy consumption system or equipment to the Energy Type it consumes

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: actsTo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking the Occupant Behavior and the Energy Consumer Faility it acts

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PowerEquipment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Power equipment is the equipment contained in district power system.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WindDirection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weather phenomenon of wind direction

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasSpeed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking a Wind and its speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PerformanceGoal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The performance that needed to be achieved

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasDeterminant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking Energy Cost to its determinants like Energy Supply and Energy Tariff

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasOccupantParameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation linking Occupant and its related parameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PhysicalObject
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An inanimate, three-dimensional object or substance. The physical object identified in the district.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ElectricVehicle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Electric vehicle that stores energy.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasInfluenceOn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relation to describe one thing influence to another thing

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: IndoorComfort
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indoor comfort describes the indoor environment

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Temperature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Outdoor temperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PhotovoltaicType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Photovoltaic type describes the type of PV generating unit

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WindSpeed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weather phenomenon of wind speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: FeedInTariff
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The tariff for sale energy per unit to main grid

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyStorage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy stored by storage system

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BuildingElement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The element composes the building structure.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EnergyDemand
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The energy demand in district or buildings

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Occupant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The occupant who occupies the zone in building
